name: Namnokh
description:
Namnokh is a Puzzle-Platformer where you take on the role of the nomadic Wanderer. After discovering an ancient sentient Box, you must use it's powers to bounce, change it's weight and pass through certain parts of the environment to traverse the ruins of Namnokh.

Through night, dawn and day, you can explore the land, collect tokens and discover the dark past of The Box and the city of Namnokh.
